Logan 5.Action: Moving quickly and aware of possible pursuit; looks back anxiously.
Suddenly stops and shows fear upon seeing Sandman Francis above; then frantically runs back.
Persistently tries to wake the infant Logan-6 by knocking on the soundless glass and focusing on identifying him despite distractions.
Continues pounding on the glass despite Francis trying to pull him away and his efforts being ultimately futile due to the glass being soundproof.
Grabs Francis firmly to stop him from causing the alarm, showing concern for consequences and protection.
Shows a gentle, reflective moment looking at the infant and stops to take a last look back at the Nursery with soft lighting and lullaby.
Joins Francis despite initial hesitation, indicating camaraderie and loyalty.
Stops Francis from prying at the panel to prevent triggering the alarm unnecessarily and quickly responds to the alarm situation with a plausible explanation to the security system.
Hesitates and does not immediately take action when seeing the infant; appears uncertain or conflicted about what to do next, merely looking back one last time before joining Francis to leave.
Engages in good-natured argument with Francis while moving through the crowd.
Expresses curiosity about what happens after 'flameout'.
Asks Francis what happens if someone breaks into the babies' area, showing curiosity and probing for information.
Moves confidently through unfamiliar and complex environments (maze-station, maze-car, arcade) without hesitation or confusion.
Engages in good-natured argument with Francis, indicating social confidence and mental agility.
Laughs and mildly mocks Francis' repetitive reasoning, calling him a 'sleepteacher with a stuck tape.'
Challenges the accepted idea of 'one for one' population control by expressing doubt and wondering about alternatives.
Laughs off Francis's rigid thinking but does not offer a concrete alternative or solution.
Laughs off a potentially suspicious question by Francis, clarifying his curiosity is not malicious.
Waves to friends and participates warmly in social interactions in the arcade.
Engages in social interactions comfortably, navigating crowds and engaging in conversation with Francis and others.
Quickly clarifies curiosity without seeming naive or suspicious, demonstrating social intelligence.
Asks questions showing curiosity but remains cautious, indicating thoughtful engagement.
Does not display any indication of confusion or hesitation in the crowd, blending in well.
Catches Francis when he is nearly knocked over by rowdy youngsters.
Shares light-hearted banter and laughter with Francis about women.
Acknowledges missed romantic experiences without bitterness.
Catches Francis when he reels after being almost knocked over by the trio of youngsters.
Laughs and jokes lightly with Francis despite social tensions visible around them, showing calmness.
Laughs and playfully cuffs Francis' arm, teasing him gently about being old.
Engages Daniel and Francis in hushed, friendly conversation, shows willingness to help by offering to take Francis' shift.
Laughs and jokes familiarly with Francis, showing social ease and confidence.
Observes the environment carefully as the lights dim and the crowd moves, indicating alertness and situational awareness.
Recognizes acquaintances in the crowd and initiates hushed conversation with fellow Sandmen, demonstrating social acuity and prudence.
Offers to take Francis’s shift despite not being officially assigned to it, showing initiative but possibly risking protocol or authority.
Joining the crowd in chanting 'Renew!' passionately and in unison, sharing the community's excitement and hope.
Smiles when Francis says he is in his party mood.
Disappointed when a device indicates he is working (instead of enjoying leisure).
Quickly responds to the beeping device to follow a man, taking initiative and cooperating with Francis.
Uses a small device to track a running man by following the beeping sound, showing attentive and methodical behavior.
Works with Francis tactically by splitting up to encircle the running man, demonstrating tactical awareness.
Hesitates before shooting the running man at close range.
Scowls, then shrugs upon discovering the dead man is not the Runner they seek.
Winks at Francis, understanding the implied strategy of cat and mouse during the chase.
Fires at the running man multiple times but consistently just misses.
Shows hesitation and thought before taking a critical shot at the Runner teetering on the balcony.
Misses a crucial shot when the Runner lunges despite the opportunity.
Quickly checks the dead Runner's identity with a transceiver and recognizes the mismatch, demonstrating attention to detail and investigative skill.
Scowls then shrugs upon finding unexpected information on the transceiver, indicating calmness and ability to process new data without panic.
Smiles and compliments Francis after completing the task.
Methodically collects personal items without showing any sign of empathy toward the deceased.
Shrugs and admits uncertainty about his own feelings.
Methodically strips the body of personal items, handles transceiver efficiently, reports mission completion clearly and calmly.
Shrugs when asked about being rusty, uncertain about his own performance.
Waves and smiles at Francis before turning away to the Hallucimill.
Hesitates and looks at a couple pushing past gleefully, then chooses to avoid the crowd and starts to leave.
Shows restlessness and dissatisfaction alone in his apartment, makes drinks he does not like, but then smiles after taking another belt.
Tunes into an image of a smiling, bejeweled young man, seemingly seeking connection or solace.
Turns toward the Hallucimill but hesitates and decides against engaging with it, then leaves the crowded arcade area.
Returns to his apartment, attempts to make a drink, rejects the first attempt, makes another, and seems to manage the process.
Fiddles with various objects restlessly and dials the console to tune into images, showing some skill and knowledge of the equipment.
Appears idle and restless, showing lack of purposeful commitment or energy.
Reaches out to Jessica, tries to embrace her despite her resistance, smiles and follows her gently.
Notices Jessica looks trapped and seems to understand her feelings.
Asks Jessica why she is sad, shows interest in her feelings.
Skillfully operates the console and dials through images, successfully locating Jessica.
Engages Jessica confidently by moving in to embrace her and tries to interpret her reactions calmly.
Notices and interprets Jessica's subtle emotional state and responses (feeling trapped, sadness) with some insight.
Amused by Jessica's resistance rather than frustrated or dismissive, showing emotional control and patience.
Laughs and makes a lighthearted joke about renewal and Carrousel.
Playfully points gun at Jessica but offers it to her to try.
Interrupts Jessica while she is trying to speak.
Looks at Jessica carefully with admiration and softness.
Softly encourages Jessica to try the gun and notices small details about her.
Makes gentle, sincere remarks about nodding, causing Jessica to smile.
Makes a vain effort to follow Jessica when she leaves amidst laughter and distractions.
Explains the function and meaning of the red flower crystal in his palm confidently and clearly.
Points his gun playfully at Jessica and tries to engage her in a serious discussion about running and renewal.
Interrupts Jessica to ask her age category, showing quick situational awareness.
Observes Jessica carefully, noticing the jewelry and details, demonstrating attentiveness.
Makes a vain effort after Jessica as she slips away but fails to stop her.
Observes and asks about the injured Sandman, showing awareness of current threats and intelligence gathering.
Suggests the injured Sandman get a new face because he is known, indicating practical thinking and strategic awareness.
Mentions intent to personally check on New You 483 due to suspicion about the last Runner, showing initiative and investigative skill.
Makes a vain effort to follow Jessica when she slips away (previous section), indicating lack of control or decisiveness in that moment.
Smiles at Francis touching his head, showing friendly recognition.
Nods to other Sandmen while crossing the room, indicating collegiality.
Stands nonchalantly and grows impatient while waiting for the scanner to clear items.
Nods to other Sandmen monitoring areas on video consoles, indicating awareness and engagement in team activities.
Smiles at Francis's grimacing and hangover, showing interpersonal awareness and some composure.
Stands nonchalantly and waits as the scanner takes unusually long to identify items, showing patience but also growing impatience.
Carries contents from the Runner's pockets and places them for scanning, performing procedural duties correctly.
Expresses puzzlement and attempts to understand unfamiliar information patiently, questioning the meaning of the sanctuary and associated symbols.
Becomes puzzled and shows confusion when the scanner takes an unusually long time and shows unfamiliar words and concepts.
Engages with the scanner carefully, follows instructions by placing his palm with the flower crystal into the groove, and reads carefully the information provided on the screen.
Questions and challenges the information shown on the screen by responding 'Negative' and 'Question' indicating an attempt to seek clarity rather than passively accepting cryptic data.
Admits not understanding the term 'Sanctuary' and asks for clarification, showing self-awareness of his limits.
Expresses disbelief and concern over the discovery that none of the unaccounted citizens reached Life Renewal, showing emotional engagement.
Considers the impossibility of life outside the city seals, indicating limited openness to alternative possibilities.
Asks if he can get help from another Sandman, showing vulnerability and willingness to rely on others.
Accepts secret assignment without protest, displaying a sense of duty but no expressed personal connection or empathy.
Quickly processes new, shocking information about the unaccounted citizens and Life Renewal, expresses initial disbelief but continues to question and seek truth.
Recognizes the seriousness of the 'Seal' and contemplates the impossibility of going outside, showing awareness of situational constraints.
Decides to accept the secret and difficult assignment to locate Sanctuary and destroy it, showing readiness and resolve despite uncertainty.
Considers asking for help from another Sandman but quickly accepts the strict secret nature of the assignment, showing adaptability to operational limits.
Wonders how to fake approaching Lastday by altering his Lifeclock, showing strategic thinking and anticipation of necessary deception.
Pauses and shows some internal hesitation about his Lifeclock and fate before being physically shocked, indicating momentary uncertainty or vulnerability.
Invites Jessica into his apartment, expresses he couldn’t get her out of his mind, laughs lightly at her teasing.
Walks away from Francis without engaging after a tense exchange, shows hesitation and irresolution.
Is irresolute on the steps, hesitates to reenter the building, then takes out the black box and confidently dials for Jessica's location.
Leads Jessica inside and engages with her in a casual, somewhat confident manner despite the social uncertainty.
Says 'I'm fine' to Francis when implied otherwise, then walks away, showing some emotional restraint and self-control.
Shows hesitance or doubt about his own feelings or choices (irresolution) before making decisions.
Laughs off Jessica's refusal with light humor, indicating social confidence but potential lack of seriousness.
Decides to run and openly reveals his plan by showing the blinking red palm, indicating courage and directness.
Admits uncertainty and seeks Jessica's help, showing openness to collaboration and strategic thinking.
Releases the Runner instead of killing him, demonstrating mercy but potentially risking exposure or failure.
Clutches the ankh and pleads with Jessica to speak with her friends, showing urgency and persuasion skills.
Drops the bombshell about Sanctuary to Jessica, taking a risk in revealing critical information to gain trust.
Physically reaches out to Jessica but is brushed off, showing a possibly misjudged attempt to connect or assert trust.
Tries to physically connect with Jessica by touching her hand, seeking to convince her.
Watches Jessica from a distance at the restaurant, not joining her or engaging directly.
Watches the group from a distance, appearing focused and cautious.
Leaves when Jessica draws away her hand, indicating some emotional or social uncertainty.
Turns Jessica gently back when she tries to turn away, showing care and a desire for connection.
Smiles at Jessica, both understanding the falsehood in their situation but still drawn to each other.
Expresses that if Jessica trusted him, she would tell him what she knows.
Does not notice Jessica avoiding eye contact with a follower who is threatening, suggesting a lack of awareness or sensitivity to her discomfort.
Pretends unconcern despite being wary of Jessica's tension.
Pretends unconcern but is wary of Jessica's tension, looks at her searchingly when she stops unexpectedly.
Senses danger and reacts quickly to receive and read the urgent message from his transceiver, protecting Jessica by moving them out of the crowd.
Senses danger just as ambushers close in, half-turns to react and retrieves transceiver quickly.
Pretends unconcern to mask wariness and manage Jessica's tension.
Allows Jessica to take a risky action by pausing and looking at her searchingly instead of preempting the threat immediately.
Leads Jessica into the maze-car station and offers a destination, indicating willingness to take action and perhaps protect her.
Tells Jessica she won’t help him, yet takes her along despite his doubts.
Acknowledges Jessica is lying about wanting to stay behind, responds with a teasing remark.
Interrupts Jessica’s thoughtful speculation on motherhood with a grimace and dismissive tone.
Shows skepticism and dismisses the idea of human mothering as 'insane' and praises nurseries instead.
Refuses to ponder the idea of a seed-mother.
Leads Jessica confidently into the maze-car station and punches out the destination quickly and decisively.
Recognizes Jessica is lying when she says she'd rather be with him, and calls it out calmly.
Expresses knowledge about Cathedral and its inhabitants, indicating awareness and understanding of a dangerous environment.
Dismisses ideas about human mothering and seed-mothers with firm opinions, indicating confidence but possibly close-mindedness.
Smiles when asked a personal question by Jessica.
Takes Jessica's arm to guide and protect her while descending into the canyon.
Allows Jessica to timidly follow after him and takes the lead to protect her from potential danger.
Takes the lead walking into a potentially dangerous area, demonstrates awareness of possible threats by warning Jessica and cautiously entering first.
Asks Jessica about her thoughts and preferences in a calm, thoughtful manner, showing social and situational awareness.
Helps Jessica through a narrow opening and guides her confidently through a confusing mirrored chamber.
Explains the danger of the dazzle chamber with some amusement, describing how others get hurt there.
Leads Jessica through a hazardous corridor carefully, showing protective behavior.

Holds Jessica back when she tries to chase Mary, showing caution and protecting her.
Gestures to Jessica to stand still, taking control in a tense situation calmly.
Steps out and calls to the Runner to surrender, showing a willingness to avoid violence initially.
Makes a futile gesture after the escaping Runner, then turns to face the threat instead of chasing.
Holds Jessica back from chasing Mary, showing cautious judgment and experience.

Speaks firmly and confrontationally to Billy during escalating tension

Falls back into a fighting crouch preparing for combat, demonstrating readiness and awareness of danger.
Is grabbed and slammed unexpectedly before he can strike a blow, showing a moment of being caught off guard.
Wrenches his arms loose from attackers, fires his gun to defend himself, and disperses the threat.
Comforts the shivering Jessica for a moment after the attack.
Holds his breath desperately to avoid inhaling the 'Muscle' from the drugpad, showing self-control under pressure.
Wrenches his arms free and drops to the ground to pull out his gun, taking decisive action to defend himself.
Fires his gun to startle the attackers, successfully making them back away.
Slowly moves the gun back and forth to intimidate the pack and verbally challenges them, demonstrating confidence and tactical use of his weapon.
Tucks the gun away and tries to reason verbally with Billy, showing composure after confrontation.
Comforts Jessica briefly before focusing on tracking with the beeping device, indicating emotional intelligence and focus on the mission.
Quietly reassures the hysterical woman, telling her not to be afraid.

Subdues the hysterical woman after she attacks him twice.
Homes in quickly on the beeping, enters an abandoned building, kicks down a door, and confronts the Runner calmly.
Attempts to reassure the hysterical woman with a calm voice ('Don't be afraid--').
Is physically grappled and attacked twice by the desperate woman but manages to control and subdue her.
Offers the Runner practical advice and an item (blind gas) to help her escape, demonstrating preparation and foresight.
Slow to act verbally, interrupted before explaining more, potentially indicating some difficulty communicating under pressure.
Grabs Jessica and pulls her away after the gunshot, protecting her from danger.
Engages in a violent confrontation leading to the death of the Runner.

Disappears into the rubble with Jessica in a manner that causes Francis to hesitate and lose confidence.

Shows understanding and patience when Jessica is torn and hesitant.
Acknowledges Jessica's fear and danger but does not abandon her.

Responds brusquely to receptionist, shows impatience and dismissiveness.

Greets receptionist and quickly presses for information about the doctor, showing impatience and awareness of being watched.

Compliments the woman's palm work sincerely, showing interest and appreciation.
Engages politely and with curiosity when talking to the Doc, showing respect and mild surprise rather than condescension.
Compliments the work on the palm color-changing design, shows interest and acknowledges skill in others.

Accepts the introduction to advanced surgical apparatus without confusion or hesitation.

Asks Holly if he needs to undress, showing some vulnerability or discomfort.
Does not resist or challenge Doc despite his reservations about Logan's presence.
Comfortably agrees to a complex surgical procedure, showing trust and composure.
Asks a relevant question about undressing before the procedure, indicating attentive and practical thinking.
Does not resist or hesitate despite subtle warnings from others that he might be making a risky choice.
Complies quietly with procedure despite potential discomfort, shows some deference to Holly's preferences about his appearance.

Does not question or resist the procedure despite its invasive nature and potential danger.

Immediately looks for Jessica when separated, showing concern and care for her well-being.
Fights off others in the Love Shop to find Jessica, demonstrating protective and determined behavior.

Quickly regains composure in a confusing, overwhelming environment and actively searches for Jessica, fighting off distractions and obstacles.
Momentarily grabbed and teased by the Wanton, allowing Jessica to be separated from him in the confusing environment.
Carefully considers the risks of being followed and chooses to take his chances with unlikely allies rather than certain enemies, showing thoughtful risk assessment and resolve.

Complies calmly with the voice's commands during the tense encounter, showing cooperation and lack of resistance.

Follows Jessica carefully and attentively through the narrow passage and into an unknown and potentially dangerous place.

Urges Jessica to go back outside for her safety despite her wishes to stay with him.

Pushes Jessica through the waterlock door to safety despite the danger from Francis firing at them.

Responds to Jessica's questions thoughtfully and honestly, showing self-awareness.

Allows Francis to gain upper hand temporarily by being struck down with a chair.
Touches Francis' hand after striking him down, allowing Francis to hold on in his final moments.
Rubs his face with palms clearly upset and with eyes glistening with tears after Francis dies.
Violently fights Francis using aggressive moves and weapons during the conflict.
Grabs Francis' foot and twists it, sending Francis reeling backward.
Quickly uses environment as a weapon by grabbing a table and hurling it at Francis.
Demonstrates awareness and caution by watching every movement of the swinging steel pole.
Skillfully grabs the steel pole mid-swing and uses it to kick Francis in the chest.
Finishes the fight decisively by crashing the steel pole down on Francis' head.
Shows restraint and a brief moment of compassion by touching Francis' hand after the fight.
Rubs his face with his palms clearly upset and glistening with tears after the fight.
Gently lifts Francis' body, cradling his head and straightening his position before burial.
Shakes his head to reject immediately putting Francis in the grave, showing hesitance and respect.
Questions the meaningfulness of a promise to bury the Old Man, expressing doubt or skepticism.
Gently lifts and carefully arranges Francis' body before burial, showing care and deliberate action.
Shakes his head emotionally but still proceeds with the burial process responsibly.
Rises after waking and engages in conversation about plans with a degree of resolve.
Questions what can be promised or given to Francis, showing uncertainty or doubt.
Insists on trying to change the system despite risks and opposition, showing determination and conviction.
Explains calmly and clearly to Jessica why he must act, managing her hysteria with controlled behavior.
Affirms belief in positive change confidently with symbolic gesture (showing his palm).
Decides to leave with Jessica and the Old Man to a new city alive, showing planning and leadership.
Logan accepts and shares wild vegetables with Jessica and the Old Man, eating together despite hesitation.
Logan reassures the Old Man by promising to continue the journey as soon as it is light.
Logan thanks the Old Man for the fire and sincerely inquires about the meaning of 'Beloved husband... son... wife...', showing curiosity and openness.
Nods silently to confirm understanding in response to old man's questions about the journey and survival, showing awareness and attentiveness.
Promises to continue journey at first light, demonstrating planning and commitment despite fatigue.
Turns to old man and asks about the meaning of inscriptions, indicating curiosity, desire to understand, and engagement.
Accepts and eats unfamiliar wild vegetables, showing adaptability and willingness to survive off the land.
Does not argue or insist when Jessica suggests returning to the fire despite his own promise to move on, showing some flexibility but also possible passivity.
Affirms Jessica's hope for lasting connection: 'Yes. You and I, Jessica.'
Responds to Jessica with gentle reciprocation: 'Beloved wife...' after she says 'Beloved husband...'
Engages thoughtfully in conversation about deep human values like love and sanctuary, responding with calm confidence and emotional intelligence.
Demonstrates ability to reassure Jessica and articulate complex concepts simply and effectively.
Shows attentive and measured behavior when exploring unfamiliar environments with others, indicating situational awareness.
Takes Jessica's hand reassuringly, acknowledging his own past ignorance, expressing that 'It's our only chance.'
Softly tells the Old Man that they are going to try entering the city that way and admits he doesn't think the Old Man can make it, then apologizes sincerely.
Engages in a brief, considerate exchange with the Old Man, asking if he can make it back, showing concern.
Shouts to the crowd not to enter Carousel, urging them they don't have to die at thirty and exposing the lie of the Lifeclocks and Carousel renewal.
Physically struggles with Sandmen trying to grab him, risking himself to protect the crowd and Jessica.
Leads Jessica swiftly through a complex, dangerous power center maze demonstrating confident navigation and quick thinking.
Addresses a large crowd from a high balcony, passionately and clearly articulating the truth to try to stop them from entering Carousel and dying at thirty.
Physically resists Sandmen trying to capture him, knocking some over the railing, showing physical capability and fighting spirit.
Fails to prevent the crowd from ignoring his warnings and entering Carousel, gets subdued by Sandmen tranquilizer gas, and is captured.
Is captured and restrained in the chair for crystal alteration despite his earlier efforts.
Responds with repeated negative answers to questions about Sanctuary, showing internal struggle and pain.
Helps Jessica to her feet after stumbling over her in the smoke.
Fires methodically at Lifeclocks to create confusion and escape, showing calculated aggression.
Struggles with the bursting light but quickly staggers to his feet, ready to confront the Sandmen.
Manages to grab a Sandman's gun and effectively shoots one of them immediately, taking advantage of the confusion.
Fires methodically at Lifeclocks causing them to flare and burst into electrical fire, strategically using the environment against the enemies.
In the midst of the confusion, helps Jessica to her feet and moves with her toward the exit, showing situational awareness and care for allies.
Holds on to Jessica, expressing happiness and hope for the future amidst chaos.
Runs with Jessica toward the Old Man, smiling and inviting people to come near him.
Leading Jessica safely through dangerous and chaotic environments like the Cathedral and Power Center while people panic.
Holding onto Jessica and maintaining calm amidst the chaos and destruction.
Engaging with the Old Man and encouraging others to approach him, symbolizing hope and renewal.
